com.veeplay.cast

Class VeeplayCastManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.veeplay.cast.VeeplayCastManager

  • public class VeeplayCastManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class around the Cast Companion Library that connects the Google Cast functionality with the Veeplay SDK
    Author:
    Andrei Marinescu

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static VeeplayCastManager getInstance()
        Access the VeeplayCastManager instance
        Returns:
        the singleton instance

      • init

        public void init(Activity act,
        java.lang.String applicationId,
        java.lang.Class targetActivity)
        Initialize the casting manager. Should be called along with the Veeplay SDK init.
        Parameters:
        act - the currently running activity
        applicationId - your Cast application ID. If null, the default VeePlay app ID will be used.
        targetActivity - the activity to be launched when selecting a device playing media from the MediaRoute dialog.

      • onActivityPaused

        public void onActivityPaused()
        Signals for activity lifecycle. Should not be called directly, the corresponding methods in the Veeplay instance should be called when transitioning the activity lifecycle (onPause, onResume)

      • onActivityResumed

        public void onActivityResumed()
        Signals for activity lifecycle. Should not be called directly, the corresponding methods in the Veeplay instance should be called when transitioning the activity lifecycle (onPause, onResume)

      • getVideoCastManager

        public com.google.android.libraries.cast.companionlibrary.cast.VideoCastManager getVideoCastManager()
        Access the underlying VideoCastManager in the CCL library
        Returns:
        a VideoCastManager instance

      • getConnectedDeviceName

        public java.lang.String getConnectedDeviceName()
        Get the currently connected Google Cast device name
        Returns:
        the cast device name, or null if there is no connected cast device

      • isCastDeviceConnected

        public boolean isCastDeviceConnected()
        Checks if the application is currently connected to a Google Cast enabled device.
        Returns:

      • isCastDevicePresent

        public boolean isCastDevicePresent()
        Checks if a Google Cast device is present on the network.
        Returns:

      • isMediaLoaded

        public boolean isMediaLoaded()
        Checks is media is loaded to the connected Google Cast device.
        Returns:
        true if there is loaded media, false if there are no connected devices, or there is no loaded media.

      • getMediaRouteButton

        public android.support.v7.app.MediaRouteButton getMediaRouteButton(Context ctx)
        Returns a new MediaRouteButton instance. Visibility will be automatically changed when the availability of Google Cast devices on the network changes
        Parameters:
        ctx -
        Returns:
        a new MediaRouteButton instance

      • removeMediaRouteButton

        public void removeMediaRouteButton(android.support.v7.app.MediaRouteButton mediaRouteButton)
        Should be called when a mediaRouteButton is no longer needed.
        Parameters:
        mediaRouteButton -
